english: structural particle; to get, obtain; must, have to

etymology.description: The character 得 represents an ideogrammic compound formed from 貝 (běi, "cowry") and 又 (yòu, "hand") — symbolizing the action of picking up a cowry, which is associated with obtaining valuables.
etymology.interpretation: The imagery of a hand picking up cowries effectively conveys the concept of obtaining or acquiring something valuable.

examples.chinese: 我得到了很多帮助。(我得到了很多幫助。)
examples.english: I received a lot of help.

examples.chinese: 你得去那里。(你得去那裡。)
